name: Zylot - Rays (Burst)

shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000

shapecode_3_g=0.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + bass*.3;
per_frame_3=wave_g = wave_g + treb*.3;
per_frame_4=wave_b = wave_b + mid*.3;
per_frame_5=rot = .01*sin(time*.05)
per_pixel_1=ray = 3.1415926 * pow(rad,2);
per_pixel_2=zoom = (ray/rad)*1.7;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float dd = 2+sin(time*.7464526);
warp_4=`    float du = 2+sin(time*.9875432);
warp_5=`    // sample previous frame
warp_6=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, uv + float2(0,dd)*texsize.zw ).xyz);
warp_7=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, uv - float2(0,du)*texsize.zw ).xyz);
warp_8=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, uv + float2(dd,0)*texsize.zw ).xyz);
warp_9=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, uv - float2(du,0)*texsize.zw ).xyz);
warp_10=`    
warp_11=`    ret *= .7;
warp_12=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret *= 2.00; //gamma
comp_5=`
comp_6=`    ret += GetBlur1(uv);
comp_7=`    ret += GetBlur2(uv);
comp_8=`}
